Package org.elasticsearch.indices.recovery

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecoveryTarget.RecoveryListener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RecoveryFileChunkRequest  
    RecoverySettings  
    RecoverySource
    The source recovery accepts recovery requests from other peer shards and start the recovery process from this source shard to the target shard.
    RecoverySource.Actions  
    RecoveryState
    Keeps track of state related to shard recovery.
    RecoveryState.File  
    RecoveryState.Index  
    RecoveryState.Start  
    RecoveryState.Timer  
    RecoveryState.Translog  
    RecoveryStatus  
    RecoveryTarget
    The recovery target handles recoveries of peer shards of the shard+node to recover to.
    RecoveryTarget.Actions  
    StartRecoveryRequest  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RecoveryState.Stage  
    RecoveryState.Type  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DelayRecoveryException
    An exception marking that this recovery attempt should be ignored (since probably, we already recovered).
    IgnoreRecoveryException
    An exception marking that this recovery attempt should be ignored (since probably, we already recovered).

    RecoveryFailedException
